on reading compounds: 蓬窓【ホウソウ】window with a view of a Japanese mugwort thicket, poor house, humble house, primitive house
kun reading compounds: 蓬【よもぎ】Japanese mugwort (Artemisia princeps, Artemisia indica var. maximowiczii), plants in the Artemisia genus, mugwort, sagebrush, wormwood
蓬生【よもぎう】wasteland, area overgrown with weeds
タカ蓬【タカよもぎ】Artemisia selengensis
